cd ${PKG_ROOT}
go run ${WORK}/main.go
cd ${WORK}
cmp stdout want.txt

-- main.go --
package main

import . "github.com/efd6/dispear"

func main() {
	DESCRIPTION("fingerprint")

	FINGERPRINT("_id", "src1", "src2").IGNORE_FAILURE(true)

	Generate()
}
-- want.txt --
---
description: fingerprint
processors:
  - fingerprint:
      tag: fingerprint_into__id_5498ba4e
      fields:
        - src1
        - src2
      target_field: _id
      ignore_failure: true
